Random Geekery

All Pages Posts Now

obsidian-export

Summary

A Rust library and CLI tool for exporting Obsidian vault contents into regular Markdown.

Jots

This cuts down a few steps for your Static Site Generator or other processing scripts.

There’s curl-bash installation instructions corresponding to specific versions on the Releases page.

The obsidian-export README provides sample templates for Using obsidian-export with Hugo

Obsidian Sync doesn’t copy dotfiles. .export-ignore needs to be added on every platform that you’re running obsidian-export. So, better keep track of My export-ignore

Transforms unavailable links – say, 2024-01-21 for example – into unlinked italicized text during export.

Related

GitHub - zoni/obsidian-export: Rust library and CLI to export an Obsidian vault to regular Markdown
